Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供 DeviceSpecific/Choice 建構內的單一選項。

span.span: Provides a single choice within a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是類似[\<選擇 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)項目。This class is analogous to the [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element. 選擇測試內出現的順序[ \](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)項目。Choices are tested in the order that they appear within a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element. 如果您指定的屬性``項目，其值必須是裝置篩選條件中所定義的名稱``Machine.config 檔的區段。If you specify the property of the `` element, its value must be the name of a device filter defined in the `` section of the Machine.config file. 在執行階段，ASP.NET 會評估指定的裝置篩選器，針對目前的裝置的功能。At run time, ASP.NET evaluates the specified device filter against the capabilities of the current device. 如果成功，則會選取該選項。If successful, the choice is selected. 如果您未指定屬性，則會預設為``選取項目。If you do not specify the property, the defaults for the `` element are selected. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範``在映像中的項目。The following code example shows a `` element within an image. `Source`屬性覆寫屬性控制項。The `Source` attribute overrides the property of the control. 雖然此範例會使用函式來判斷瀏覽器是否需要 WML (`isWML11`) 或支援彩色列印 (`supportsColor`)，您可以改為使用 Web.config 檔案來定義``.NET Framework 會自動使用進行的項目為您的決定。Although the example uses functions to determine whether the browser requires WML (`isWML11`) or supports color (`supportsColor`), you can instead use a Web.config file to define a `` element that the .NET Framework automatically uses to make the determination for you. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁語法概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 篩選條件是否為 「 比較 」 篩選條件的值來取代 Web.config 中定義的引數值。如果的值是一種方法的名稱 (頁面或關閉 Web.config 所指的組件中)，值提供做為引數，該方法。If the filter is a comparison filter, the value of is used in place of the argument value defined in Web.config. If the value of is the name of a method (either on the page or off in an assembly pointed to by Web.config), the value of is supplied as an argument to that method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫的屬性處理之後，變更這個集合 (在方法) 沒有任何作用。Changing this collection after overridden properties have been processed (in the method) has no effect. 這個方法主要由控制項設計工具，並不是一般用途。This method is used primarily by control designers and is not intended for general use.

summary.span: 取得或設定裝置篩選條件的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a device filter.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。
如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The name of a device filter.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 篩選名稱必須是方法，以在頁面上，在相關聯的名稱`.ascx`中定義的檔案或有效的裝置篩選器名稱 <`deviceFilters`> Web.config 區段。指定方法名稱，但如果屬性、 方法，必須符合下列的原型。The filter name must be the name of a method on the page, in the associated `.ascx` file, or the name of a valid device filter defined in the <`deviceFilters`> section of Web.config. If a method name is specified with the property, that method must match the following prototype. ``` public bool methodName(System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities capabilities, String optionalArgument) ``` 例如，如果屬性設定為`myChoiceMethod`，必須具有下列簽章的方法。For example, if the property was set to `myChoiceMethod`, a method with the following signature must exist. ``` public bool myChoiceMethod(System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities capabilities, String optionalArgument); ``` 評估時[\<選擇 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)項目，會進行檢查以判斷網頁上是否有適當的簽章的方法。When evaluating the [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element, a check is made to determine whether a method of the appropriate signature exists on the page. 如果不是，ASP.NET 檢查 <`deviceFilters`> Web.config 區段。If not, ASP.NET checks the <`deviceFilters`> section of Web.config. > [!NOTE] > 裝置篩選條件會區分大小寫。Device filters are case-sensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性主要由控制項設計工具，並不適用於一般開發人員使用。This property is used primarily by control designers and is not intended for general developer use. 值繼承自包含的控制項或頁面。The value is inherited from the containing control or page.
